}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:24.480
    | text      = The audit of the department dated December 17th, 2012,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:27.980
    | text      = conducted by County Treasurer Beth Sallie and signed by Judge William O. Smith,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:32.279
    | text      = concluded that Payman had not...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:34.580
    | text      = was not keeping appropriate receipts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:36.679
    | text      = He was not tracking expenses correctly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:38.580
    | text      = And he had, quote, exceeded his salary limits,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:41.279
    | text      = according to the county's approved budget.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:43.080
    | text      = Due what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:43.679
    | text      = They found that he was running a deficit in his department of over $112,000
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.379
    | text      = and the fiscal court...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.980
    | text      = Annually?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:49.580
    | text      = Well, yeah, in that year.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.179
    | text      = And that the fiscal court had already loaned his department $277,000 to pay salaries,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:55.980
    | text      = which he had not reimbursed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.779
    | text      = These numbers are completely insane,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:59.779
    | text      = particularly when you learn that according to Kentucky.gov,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:02.980
    | text      = the Jackson County, Kentucky Sheriff's Department currently employs exactly seven officers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:08.179
    | text      = and back when Payman was Sheriff, that number may have been two.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:11.379
    | text      = So it was a very small department.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:12.779
    | text      = Right, right, right, right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:13.879
    | text      = So he's, he's an embezzler.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:16.580
    | text      = It's unclear.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:17.779
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:18.879
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:19.580
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.080
    | text      = I'm not, I wouldn't make that allegation against him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:22.679
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:22.980
    | text      = He may be just bad at finances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:25.980
    | text      = Yeah, whatever it is, it could be some mismanagement action.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:29.779
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:30.179
    | text      = That's, that is a possibility.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:31.679
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:32.980
    | text      = So anyway, Judge William O. Smith said at the time that it,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.679
    | text      = quote, was the worst audit I've ever seen of a county office.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:40.179
    | text      = In the audit report, there's a section where Payman can respond,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:42.679
    | text      = and he acknowledged all of the identified problems as being real,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:45.279
    | text      = but says things like they're being taken care of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:47.580
    | text      = and that he didn't know where these were happening or that these things were problems.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:51.480
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:52.179
    | text      = Flash forward about a year,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:53.679
    | text      = and he's not taking care of the Sheriff's Department fiscal problems.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:56.679
    | text      = So again, there are concerns raised,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:59.279
    | text      = and controls of the department's finances get taken away and given to the fiscal court,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:03.679
    | text      = and they also start another police department.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:06.579
    | text      = I really think that should have been the situation the first time you talked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:10.279
    | text      = Maybe give them a chance to fix the problem.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:12.279
    | text      = Once you see your $114,000 is missing, that's not good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:16.480
    | text      = That's not good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:17.680
    | text      = Whatever the number was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.180
    | text      = Twelve.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.680
    | text      = But I say give people a shot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:21.279
    | text      = Anyway.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:21.779
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:22.079
    | text      = The Sheriff's Department was losing a ton of money,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:24.380
    | text      = and the county couldn't afford to allow it to continue down that road,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:27.579
    | text      = but still Denny Payman was not being charged with a crime,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:30.279
    | text      = and he was just having control of the department's finances put in more responsible hands.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:34.480
    | text      = Well, Denny Payman didn't take kindly to that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:37.480
    | text      = On January 2014, he showed up to a meeting of the county fiscal court,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:41.880
    | text      = and arrested Beth Sally and Judge William O. Smith,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:46.180
    | text      = who happened to be in the middle of conducting a meeting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:50.980
    | text      = Naturally, this led to the meeting having to be adjourned with some interesting responses from meeting attendees,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:57.680
    | text      = which I'm taking from an article in the Lexington Herald-Leader.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:00.579
    | text      = County Attorney George Hayes said, quote, Judge Smith's probably got him a good federal lawsuit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:06.579
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:07.480
    | text      = Quote, we had to adjourn because there's no one running the meeting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:10.380
    | text      = County Clerk Donald Duck Moore said with a laugh,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:13.279
    | text      = I know it's-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:13.779
    | text      = All right, because he's still in the Blues Brothers?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:15.880
    | text      = That's a different duck.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.180
    | text      = Gotcha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.579
    | text      = I know it's not funny, but still, and then dot, dot, dot, guy turns off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:22.380
    | text      = A number of people at the meeting were pretty concerned that they just witnessed an overt example of abuse of authority.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.279
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.480
    | text      = But, quote, Payman insisted his only motivation is to clean up local government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:31.180
    | text      = There's nothing political about doing what's right, he said.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:33.579
    | text      = Huh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:34.279
    | text      = Payman charged Sally and Smith with tampering with public records,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:37.180
    | text      = second-degree forgery, criminal facilitation, abuse of public trust,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:40.380
    | text      = and engaging in organized crime through extortion or coercion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:45.680
    | text      = Many of these are very serious felonies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:48.180
    | text      = It should be pointed out, however,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:49.380
    | text      = that he charged them without seeking an indictment or even getting a warrant signed by a judicial officer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:54.079
    | text      = I was going to say, you can't do all that, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:55.880
    | text      = This was a one-man arrest job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:57.480
    | text      = See, you started writing in, you started saying, like, he charged them, and I was like, okay, so he's gone through the district.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:03.980
    | text      = No, it's just him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:05.279
    | text      = It's just him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:06.079
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:06.579
    | text      = Did he write everything out with a pencil?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:08.880
    | text      = Maybe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:09.779
    | text      = Payman felt that he had the authority to unilaterally arrest a judge and a county treasurer because he was the sheriff,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:15.079
    | text      = and he is a part of the constitutional sheriff movement,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:17.880
    | text      = who hold that the sheriff is the highest law in the land and not subject to anyone else's authority.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:22.480
    | text      = You can't be a sheriff and be part of the constitutional sheriff movement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:26.279
    | text      = It seems self-serving.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:27.279
    | text      = That's a bad idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:28.779
    | text      = Well, Denny Payman would soon learn that these constitutional sheriff beliefs do not hold up in reality.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:33.880
    | text      = Odd. Odd.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:34.579
    | text      = Because what he did was flagrantly against the law,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:36.980
    | text      = and charges against Sally and Smith were dropped on February 6th, 2014,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:41.680
    | text      = but that didn't stop the fallout from Payman's wildly stupid behavior.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:46.579
    | text      = Judge Smith sued Payman in federal court and eventually reached a settlement awarding him $62,500.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:53.480
    | text      = Quite frankly, Payman was insanely lucky that he didn't face criminal charges
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:56.880
    | text      = and was able to just lose his re-election bid in 2014.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:00.180
    | text      = See, I think we're right back in the whole commit a bunch of crimes thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:04.279
    | text      = and then get zero punishment for it that fits it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:07.779
    | text      = You know, like $437 of the stamp doesn't trump civil rights.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:13.779
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:15.480
    | text      = I don't care what settlement you get. He just arrested people for no reason because he's crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:21.579
    | text      = And he thinks that the sheriff is the highest office in the land.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:24.279
    | text      = Yeah, that's that's immediate like goodbye.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:26.579
    | text      = Now, you know what's fucked up?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:29.180
    | text      = Judge Smith was clean.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:31.779
    | text      = Yeah, but oh, no, she's actually guilty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:34.980
    | text      = County Treasurer Beth Sally absolutely was corrupt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:39.380
    | text      = She was absolutely stealing from the county.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:41.680
    | text      = Damn it. It was a 50-50 job.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:43.680
    | text      = But what she ended up getting indicted for in 2015
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:46.880
    | text      = doesn't match with what he tried to arrest her for a year prior.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:50.079
    | text      = It's one of those weird situations where the cops try to frame someone who also happens to be guilty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:54.279
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:54.980
    | text      = Payman was acting in retaliation and his charges were complete shit,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:58.279
    | text      = but it turns out that one of the people he lashed out with was actually guilty of a settlement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:02.880
    | text      = And so she's in big trouble, but it's so crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:05.980
    | text      = And she's going to go to jail. I don't understand why he isn't in jail.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:10.380
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:10.980
    | text      = God, white manning is great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:12.579
    | text      = So about this arrest of a judge, he didn't face criminal charges for that,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:18.279
    | text      = but he wasn't so lucky in 2017 when he was arrested and charged with drug trafficking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:22.980
    | text      = Oh, well, that's simple.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:24.180
    | text      = After leaving law enforcement,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:25.579
    | text      = Payman had set up a hemp farm that he had the permission to grow hemp on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:28.980
    | text      = Oh, that's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:29.480
    | text      = Naturally, he decided to start growing straight up weed and was involved in trafficking of said weed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:33.880
    | text      = Well, naturally, I think weed should be legal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:35.980
    | text      = and I don't think that even someone as clearly an asshole as Payman should be punished for selling it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:40.480
    | text      = I do think that there's some extenuating circumstances here that I could bring up to judge him for.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:45.880
    | text      = The first is that when police showed up, they didn't just find weed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:48.680
    | text      = They also found eight vials of steroids, which he didn't have a legal reason to have,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:52.180
    | text      = which is an amount that law enforcement considers indicative of trafficking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:55.680
    | text      = They also found three loaded guns,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:57.880
    | text      = which were, quote, strategically placed in the house to defend Payman's marijuana growing operation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:02.680
    | text      = That sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:03.779
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:04.079
    | text      = He did read How to Hide Your Guns, didn't he?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:05.880
    | text      = He might have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:06.980
    | text      = It appears that he was up to a bit more than just some cool weed growing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:10.779
    | text      = Second, it strains my principles to give someone a pass for drug-related crimes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:14.680
    | text      = when they were the head of an organization that profited off locking people up for drug-related crimes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:19.480
    | text      = According to the 2016 data from Kentucky.gov,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:22.279
    | text      = of the 207 arrests made by the Jackson County Sheriff's Department, almost half were for drug offenses.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:28.279
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:28.579
    | text      = So I absolutely think that Payman shouldn't be arrested for drug charges,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:32.779
    | text      = but since he was perfectly fine being part of a system that routinely jams people up for drug charges,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:37.180
    | text      = he can have whatever sympathy is left after I exhaust my empathy on the people he arrested while he was Sheriff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:41.680
    | text      = Yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:42.680
    | text      = So, fuck him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:43.980
    | text      = Uh, poetic justice in this situation is still just kind of annoying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:47.779
    | text      = I still think that those charges, I think that the charges were dropped against him, too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:51.380
    | text      = I don't think that he ended up, uh...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:53.079
    | text      = God, these guys get away with everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:56.779
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:57.180
    | text      = They just get away with everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:58.880
    | text      = It does, it does seem that way.
}}
